# Intellij 프로젝트 생성후 세팅

## ✏️ Gradle 변경

Intellij 로 변경

![스크린샷 2023-01-03 오전 9.38.21.png](Intellij%20%E1%84%91%E1%85%B3%E1%84%85%E1%85%A9%E1%84%8C%E1%85%A6%E1%86%A8%E1%84%90%E1%85%B3%20%E1%84%89%E1%85%A2%E1%86%BC%E1%84%89%E1%85%A5%E1%86%BC%E1%84%92%E1%85%AE%20%E1%84%89%E1%85%A6%E1%84%90%E1%85%B5%E1%86%BC%20856e7e66c29a44c4a7aff4297d9b2a7a/%25E1%2584%2589%25E1%2585%25B3%25E1%2584%258F%25E1%2585%25B3%25E1%2584%2585%25E1%2585%25B5%25E1%2586%25AB%25E1%2584%2589%25E1%2585%25A3%25E1%2586%25BA_2023-01-03_%25E1%2584%258B%25E1%2585%25A9%25E1%2584%258C%25E1%2585%25A5%25E1%2586%25AB_9.38.21.png)

## ✏️ Lombok 세팅

Preference → plugin → lombok 최신버전인지 확인

![스크린샷 2023-01-03 오전 9.56.20.png](Intellij%20%E1%84%91%E1%85%B3%E1%84%85%E1%85%A9%E1%84%8C%E1%85%A6%E1%86%A8%E1%84%90%E1%85%B3%20%E1%84%89%E1%85%A2%E1%86%BC%E1%84%89%E1%85%A5%E1%86%BC%E1%84%92%E1%85%AE%20%E1%84%89%E1%85%A6%E1%84%90%E1%85%B5%E1%86%BC%20856e7e66c29a44c4a7aff4297d9b2a7a/%25E1%2584%2589%25E1%2585%25B3%25E1%2584%258F%25E1%2585%25B3%25E1%2584%2585%25E1%2585%25B5%25E1%2586%25AB%25E1%2584%2589%25E1%2585%25A3%25E1%2586%25BA_2023-01-03_%25E1%2584%258B%25E1%2585%25A9%25E1%2584%258C%25E1%2585%25A5%25E1%2586%25AB_9.56.20.png)

enable annotation processing 에 체크

## ✏️ git 자동 staging

git → Enable staging area 에 체크

![스크린샷 2023-01-03 오전 9.40.13.png](Intellij%20%E1%84%91%E1%85%B3%E1%84%85%E1%85%A9%E1%84%8C%E1%85%A6%E1%86%A8%E1%84%90%E1%85%B3%20%E1%84%89%E1%85%A2%E1%86%BC%E1%84%89%E1%85%A5%E1%86%BC%E1%84%92%E1%85%AE%20%E1%84%89%E1%85%A6%E1%84%90%E1%85%B5%E1%86%BC%20856e7e66c29a44c4a7aff4297d9b2a7a/%25E1%2584%2589%25E1%2585%25B3%25E1%2584%258F%25E1%2585%25B3%25E1%2584%2585%25E1%2585%25B5%25E1%2586%25AB%25E1%2584%2589%25E1%2585%25A3%25E1%2586%25BA_2023-01-03_%25E1%2584%258B%25E1%2585%25A9%25E1%2584%258C%25E1%2585%25A5%25E1%2586%25AB_9.40.13.png)

confirmation → when files are created → Add silently ( 자동으로 add 하기) 에 체크

- 앞으로 생성되는 file 들은 자동으로 add 됨

![스크린샷 2023-01-03 오전 9.42.55.png](Intellij%20%E1%84%91%E1%85%B3%E1%84%85%E1%85%A9%E1%84%8C%E1%85%A6%E1%86%A8%E1%84%90%E1%85%B3%20%E1%84%89%E1%85%A2%E1%86%BC%E1%84%89%E1%85%A5%E1%86%BC%E1%84%92%E1%85%AE%20%E1%84%89%E1%85%A6%E1%84%90%E1%85%B5%E1%86%BC%20856e7e66c29a44c4a7aff4297d9b2a7a/%25E1%2584%2589%25E1%2585%25B3%25E1%2584%258F%25E1%2585%25B3%25E1%2584%2585%25E1%2585%25B5%25E1%2586%25AB%25E1%2584%2589%25E1%2585%25A3%25E1%2586%25BA_2023-01-03_%25E1%2584%258B%25E1%2585%25A9%25E1%2584%258C%25E1%2585%25A5%25E1%2586%25AB_9.42.55.png)

기존에 만들어진 file staging 하기

![스크린샷 2023-01-03 오전 9.44.00.png](Intellij%20%E1%84%91%E1%85%B3%E1%84%85%E1%85%A9%E1%84%8C%E1%85%A6%E1%86%A8%E1%84%90%E1%85%B3%20%E1%84%89%E1%85%A2%E1%86%BC%E1%84%89%E1%85%A5%E1%86%BC%E1%84%92%E1%85%AE%20%E1%84%89%E1%85%A6%E1%84%90%E1%85%B5%E1%86%BC%20856e7e66c29a44c4a7aff4297d9b2a7a/%25E1%2584%2589%25E1%2585%25B3%25E1%2584%258F%25E1%2585%25B3%25E1%2584%2585%25E1%2585%25B5%25E1%2586%25AB%25E1%2584%2589%25E1%2585%25A3%25E1%2586%25BA_2023-01-03_%25E1%2584%258B%25E1%2585%25A9%25E1%2584%258C%25E1%2585%25A5%25E1%2586%25AB_9.44.00.png)
